p: Air tightness is defined in accordance to DesignBuilder classification, considering that the model house has high permeability. The parameters used were the fissures standardized according to the length of the perimeter of the gaps: internal and external windows, grids, and doors. The fissures on the roof, walls, and floor were modelled according to the average porosity of one standardized fissures, based on the surface area ( Table 2).
